name: Airbnb
description: Home rental platform that lists properties in Israeli settlements.
reasons: Lists rental properties in Israeli settlements in occupied territories
Reversed decision to delist properties in settlements

alternatives.name: Fairbnb
alternatives.description: Ethical home-sharing platform with community focus

alternatives.name: Booking.com
alternatives.description: Travel site with ethical listing policies

name: Disney
description: Media conglomerate with investments and operations in Israel.
reasons: Major investments in Israeli startup companies

alternatives.name: Criterion Channel
alternatives.description: Curated streaming service featuring global independent cinema

name: Netflix
description: Streaming service with investments in Israeli content and operations.
reasons: Production of shows that normalize occupation
Investments in Israeli media companies and studios

alternatives.name: MUBI

alternatives.name: Kanopy

name: Warner Bros
description: Film studio with productions in Israel.
reasons: Partnerships with Israeli media companies tied to settlements

name: TripAdvisor
description: Travel website listing attractions in occupied territories as 'Israel'.
reasons: Lists attractions in occupied territories under Israeli jurisdiction
Normalizes illegal settlements through tourism promotion

alternatives.name: Responsible Travel
alternatives.description: Ethical travel booking platform with transparent policies

alternatives.name: Culture Trip
alternatives.description: Travel content platform with ethical travel guides

name: LiveNation
description: Concert promoter with significant operations in Israel.
reasons: Organizes concerts in Israel despite cultural boycott calls
Partners with Israeli companies in contested territories

alternatives.name: Local Music Venues
alternatives.description: Support independent music venues and promoters

alternatives.name: Bandcamp
alternatives.description: Platform for directly supporting independent musicians

name: Booking.com
description: Travel booking platform listing accommodations in Israeli settlements.
reasons: Continues to list properties in illegal settlements
Marks disputed territories as part of Israel
